Interface Kinematics<E>

  • Type Parameters:
    E -
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MeccanumKinematics, RelativeMeccanumKinematics, RelativeSwerveDriveKinematics, SwerveDriveKinematics, TankKinematics

    public interface Kinematics<E>
    Based on a translation, calculate a value of type E.

    0.0.0
    Author:
    Colin Robertson
